name: Froslass
author: Studio Bora Inc.
flavor_text: It spits out cold air of nearly −60 degrees Fahrenheit to freeze its quarry. It brings frozen prey back to its lair and neatly lines them up.

abilities.name: Frost Over
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may attach a {W} Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crystal Breath
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t attack.
